misdeed: The village of Vangså has been plagued by strange illnesses and odd behavior. Recently, the villagers were compelled to burn down a newly built factory.
solution: The Vaesen is an ash tree wife. To destroy her, the ash tree she inhabits must be cut down or burned.

clues.description: Local flora appears unusually lush and vibrant, despite the illnesses affecting the villagers.
A villager mentions hearing a woman's voice whispering from an old ash tree at night.
Several villagers report strange dreams involving a woman with green hair and bark-like skin.
Marks resembling claw scratches are found on the ground near the old ash tree.
The village healer notes that the illnesses began after a branch of the old ash tree was broken.
An ancient local legend speaks of a spirit bound to an ash tree, demanding respect and offerings.
A child’s drawing depicts a woman merging with a tree, surrounded by wilting plants.

plotTwist.description: A group of factory workers accidentally damaged the tree while clearing the land, angering the Vaesen.
